message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value of costs related to general management and administration of the entity as a whole from the income statement.

Looking at the provided income statement, the line item that represents general management and administration costs is "Administrative Expenses" with a value of 1544669.73.

This is consistent with the example provided, where "Administrative Expenses" was also identified as the relevant line item for this task.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1544669.73'} }
```
